thread.title: Harry Kane and Danny Rose wanted for AVB reunion? Transfer news and gossip from Thursday's papers
thread.title_full: Harry Kane and Danny Rose wanted for AVB reunion? Transfer news and gossip from Thursday's papers

author: Football Spy
title: Harry Kane and Danny Rose wanted for AVB reunion? Transfer news and gossip from Thursday's papers
text:
Sport Harry Kane and Danny Rose wanted for AVB reunion? Transfer news and gossip from Thursday's papers PLUS: A Chelsea defender could be on his way to a Premier League rival on loan, while Jack Grealish could be on the move Share Kane and Rose are reportedly targets for AVB in China (Photo: Getty) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Harry Kane and Danny Rose are both targets of former Tottenham boss Andre Villas-Boas at Shanghai SIPG. 
The Chinese Super League club are believed to be interested in taking both Spurs stars before the end of the transfer window. 
However, according to the London Evening Standard , Kane has already turned down the idea of a move to Asia after receiving initial contact from intermediaries. 
Rose is also keen on a reunion with Rose, but Spurs reportedly insists that the left-back is not for sale. Kane is wanted after his impressive record in front of goal (Photo: Reuters) 
It is believed that both Manchester clubs and Paris Saint-Germain are also considering a move for the England international. 
Both Kane and Rose were out on loan during Villas-Boas' time in charge at White Hart Lane. 
Here is the latest gossip from tomorrow's papers: Transfer news and gossip from Friday's Mirror 
Aitor Karanka has confirmed Middlesbroughâ€™s interest in Paris Saint-Germain forward Jese Rodriguez. Jese could be on his way to Middlesbrough (Photo: AFP)
